code:
%% Integrated Proposal - Policy View
graph TD
  %% Governance / Policy
  G0[Infra_IngressController]
  G1[Infra_EtcdCluster]
  G2[Infra_EtcdCluster]

  %% CLEAR Core
  subgraph CORE[Infra_IngressController]
    direction LR
    KMS[Infra_IngressController]
    MQ[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    WN[Infra_RedisCache]
    DB[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    MET[Infra_RedisCache]
    KMS-->MQ-->WN-->DB-->MET
  end

  %% Edge / Municipal
  subgraph EDGE[Infra_WorkerNode]
    direction TB
    W1[Infra_IngressController]
    W2[Infra_EtcdCluster]
  end

  %% AI / Audit
  subgraph AI[Infra_RedisCache]
    A1[Infra_WorkerNode]
    A2[Infra_WorkerNode]
  end

  %% Flows
  G1-- "決済依頼（バーチャルデビット/トークン認証）" -->G2
  G2-- "Txイベント（When/Who/Whom/Coin/Value）" -->EDGE
  EDGE-- "Witnessログ送信（非同期）" -->CORE
  CORE-- "整合証跡（Merkle Root / 署名）" -->G0
  AI-- "AI結果の監査証跡付与" -->CORE
  G0-- "方針・KPI（E-MAD）" -->MET
